system.description:
A sword with the power to attack of its own accord, dancing out of its owner’s hand.

  • Activating: Before the sword may be released to attack independently (called “dancing”), the wielder must attack with it for 4 consecutive rounds.

  • Dancing: The sword attacks for 4 rounds, using the owner’s THAC0. After 4 rounds it returns to its owner’s hand.

  • Range: The sword can dance within 30’ of its owner. If the two are separated more than 30’, the sword ceases to dance, falling to the ground.
